about.title: SpawnijMiTo
about.subTitle: Learn more about
about.descriptionText: We are a Polish manufacturer of industrial furniture, lofts, Hi-fi audio tables, and speaker stands.
about.descriptionText2: Imagine your design, and we will take care of the rest!

item1.title: Hi-fi Table
item1.description: Solid steel construction made of 40x40 and 40x30 steel profiles, powder-coated in matte black with a fine texture. Oak tops with a thickness of 30 mm, equipped with low spikes and gold-colored pads.

item2.title: XXL TV Stand
item2.description: Tops made of oak wood, oiled in a clear color. Powder-coated construction in matte black with a fine texture. Black spikes with black pads.

item3.title: Short Hi-fi Table
item3.description: Made of powder-coated steel and oak tops in natural color. The whole set is complemented by black spikes and black pads.

item4.title: Audio Equipment Rack
item4.description: Shelves made of oak wood, slightly oiled in a clear shade. Construction powder-coated in matte black with a fine texture. Black spikes with black pads.

item5.title: Anti-Vibration Spikes
item5.description: Our products utilize anti-vibration spikes, which reduce the transmission of vibrations between the surface and the devices.

item6.title: Industrial TV Cabinet
item6.description: Cabinet made of nearly 50-year-old oak wood, covered with a layer of oil wax. Legs made of closed profile and expanded mesh, secured with clear lacquer.

item7.title: Speaker Stands
item7.description: Stands with reinforced construction made of 40x30 profile powder-coated in matte black with a fine texture.

item8.title: Layered Audio Table
item8.description: Table made of 40x30 profile powder-coated in matte black. Shelves made of laminated board in matte black.

item9.title: Stands
item9.description: Stands made of 40x20 profile and 30 mm thick oak wood in cherry color.

item10.title: Steel Stands
item10.description: Stands made of 40x30 profile and 5 mm thick steel plate.

item11.title: Modern Desk
item11.description: Steel frame made of 50x30 profile. Powder-coated in matte black with a fine texture. Top made of laminated board in Golden Oak Craft color.

item12.title: Audio TV Cabinet
item12.description: This time, a cabinet for equipment combining black steel and tops made of laminated board in Golden Oak Craft color.

item13.title: Cabinet with Bar
item13.description: Entirely made of 30x30 profile and crimped mesh powder-coated in matte black. Fully filled with mesh and reinforced flooring. Doors open upwards on struts and prepared for a padlock.

item14.title: Shoe and Clothing Cabinet
item14.description: Cabinet made of profile mesh and laminated board in Golden Oak Craft color.

item15.title: Industrial Armchair
item15.description: Armchair with a simple, lightweight construction and modern design. Equipped with thick, stain-resistant cushions and powder-coated construction for durability and comfort.

services.subtitle: Discover
services.title: Our Products
services.projectDescription: We create custom projects tailored to the client's expected dimensions.
services.tablesDescription: Made from natural wood or laminated board.
services.structureDescription: Welded from profiles, ground, and powder-coated.

reviews.review: I struggled with various budget tables until I found this company. I highly recommend it. Contact, project arrangements, shipping... everything at the highest level üëçüòä Ps. I've already ordered a second one.
Solidly designed cabinet, you can see the thought put into it, and the craftsmanship is excellent. Congratulations! üòè
Top-notch craftsmanship, great contact, very reasonable price. This is my first piece of furniture from this company, but certainly not the last. I highly recommend it.
